data.default: The lower of 900 and (50 + max_connections/5) (>= MariaDB 10.1.7), The lower of 150 or the value of max_connections (beween MariaDB 10.0.8 and MariaDB 10.1.7), 50 (<= MariaDB 10.0.8)
data.name: back_log

data.default: Windows >= MariaDB 10.4.3: ON, All other systems: OFF
data.name: core_file

data.default: OFF or ON - current signal signal name
data.name: debug_sync

data.default: admin, filesort, filesort_on_disk, full_join, full_scan, query_cache, query_cache_miss, tmp_table, tmp_table_on_disk (<= MariaDB 10.3.0), admin, filesort, filesort_on_disk, filesort_priority_queue, full_join, full_scan, query_cache, query_cache_miss, tmp_table, tmp_table_on_disk (>= MariaDB 10.3.1)
data.name: log_slow_filter

data.default: One less than the server maturity (>= MariaDB 10.3.3), unknown (<= MariaDB 10.3.2)
data.name: plugin_maturity

data.default: 56 before MariaDB 5.5.39 and MariaDB 10.0.10, 5 as of MariaDB 5.5.40 and MariaDB 10.0.11
data.name: progress_report_time

data.default: 1M (>= MariaDB 10.1.7), 0 (<= MariaDB 10.1.6) (although frequently given a default value in some setups)
data.name: query_cache_size

data.default: autocommit, character_set_client, character_set_connection, character_set_results, time_zone (>= MariaDB 10.3.1), empty string (<= MariaDB 10.3.0)
data.name: session_track_system_variables
